message: Let's split it 50/50, a fair start!
You're starting high, I'll meet you in the middle
I'm willing to compromise, let's meet in the middle again
You're still too high, I'll give you a small concession
I'm willing to give a bit more, but I think I deserve a fair share
I'm making a strong move, take it or leave it
I'm getting desperate, but I still want a decent share
You're running out of time, I'm taking control
I'm making a last-ditch effort, take it or leave it
You're almost out of time, I'm taking the last crumbs
